sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"使困惑，迷惑，糊涂，伤脑筋"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: puzzle, bewilder, confuse, embarrass, perplex, baffle, confound, distract
means: puzzle ： 侧重使人难于理解、困惑、伤脑筋。
bewilder ： 语气强烈，指因迷不解或惊愕而慌乱，不知所措，无法清醒地思考。
confuse ： 语气较弱，指由于混淆、混乱而糊涂。
embarrass ： 常指因处境或困难问题而感到窘迫、局促不安或焦急而不知所措。
perplex ： 除困惑外，还含焦虑或缺乏把握之意，因而难于作出决定，无从下手处理。
baffle ： 语气最强，多指遇见奇怪情景或复杂困难情况时所产生的惶恐困惑心理。
confound ： 常指人惊慌失措和狼狈不堪。
distract ： 主要用于注意力分散、思想矛盾或过分激动时产生的昏乱。

sentence.Network_en: Again and again passages in his essays exasperate or bewilder.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的文章里使人忿然或困惑的章节屡见不鲜.
这样多的问题使我困惑.

sentence.Network_en: The letter would only bewilder the mother.
sentence.Network_cn: 这信只会使妈妈惶惑不解.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语六级词汇(强烈推荐+免费下载)_百度文库 ... beware vt.&vi. 谨防，当心 bewilder vt. 迷惑，把…弄糊涂 bid vt. 命令.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... belittle 小看 bewilder 使…迷惑 before 在前面.
考博词汇下载（10000词汇完整版） - 豆丁网 ... beverage n． 饮料 bewilder v． 使迷惑， 难住 bewilderment n． 迷惑， 混乱.
博士英语词汇B_百度文库 ... beware v. 谨防 bewilder v. 使迷惑, 使……不知所措, 迷路 bewilderment n. 迷惑.

list.abs: I have just cleared up a bewildering welter of data saved in my computer .我刚整理了保存在我电脑里的很难处理的杂乱无章的数据。
Born and bred a countryman , he was bewildered by London ., 因为他是土生土长的乡下人 , 到伦敦来就晕头转向了.
bestiality 兽奸bewildered state 迷惘状态Bielschowsky disease 幼儿型家族性黑蒙性白痴.
Being in a bewildered state ; dazed., 惊讶的处于困惑状态的 ; 眩晕的.
Benny a bewildered expression on his face ., 本尼东张西望 , 脸上尽是迷茫的表情.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from be- 'thoroughly' + obsolete wilder 'lead or go astray', of unknown origin

entry.tran: 使困惑；使糊涂；使不知所措
entry.def: If something bewilders you, it is so confusing or difficult that you cannot understand it.

example.ex: The silence from Alex had hurt and bewildered her.
example.tran: 亚历克斯的沉默伤害了她，让她不知所措。

means.word_mean: 1. be a mystery or bewildering to;

auth_sentence.content: It was cruel to bewilder her.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was cruel to bewilder her.

auth_sentence.content: The language of wine can be arcane, and some descriptions may further bewilder.
auth_sentence.res_content: The language of wine can be arcane, and some descriptions may further bewilder.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The language of wine can be arcane, and some descriptions may further bewilder.

auth_sentence.content: With this sensory onslaught, he seems to be trying to bewilder us, in the service of a larger obsession; namely, bewilderment.
auth_sentence.res_content: With this sensory onslaught, he seems to be trying to bewilder us, in the service of a larger obsession; namely, bewilderment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: With this sensory onslaught, he seems to be trying to bewilder us, in the service of a larger obsession; namely, bewilderment.

sentences.en: The big city bewildered the old woman from the countryside.
sentences.cn: 大城市把乡下来的老奶奶弄糊涂了。

jushi.english: Sister Carrie was bewildered by the crowd and traffic in the city.
jushi.chinese: 嘉莉修女被城市中的人群和交通弄得晕头转向。

jushi.english: He was so bewildered that he did not know what to do.
jushi.chinese: 他非常迷惑,不知道做什么。

jushi.english: The big city bewildered the old woman from the countryside.
jushi.chinese: 大城市把乡下来的老奶奶弄糊涂了。
